LanguageData.MultipleNoticeBoards: You may only have one notice board!
LanguageData.CourierDeniedMessage: You have been denied a courier due to previous unfortunate incidents.
LanguageData.CourierArrivalMessage: A courier named {PAWN_nameDef} have arrived. {PAWN_pronoun} will deliver rent and perhaps other things too! Do try to keep {PAWN_objective} safe.
LanguageData.CourierDelivered: {PAWN_nameDef} have concluded {PAWN_possessive} delivery and will soon leave.
LanguageData.CourierDeliveredRent: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a grand total of {0} silver from tenants.
LanguageData.CourierDeliveredRentGold: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a grand total of {0} silver and {1} gold from tenants.
LanguageData.CourierDeliveredGift: {PAWN_nameDef} delivered a gift from a previous happy tenant! How nice!
LanguageData.CourierDeliveredTech: The Courier Association seem pleased with your work and decided to gift you a hint of their tech.
LanguageData.CourierTenancyNotice: {PAWN_nameDef} noticed your note for tenancy and will bring it with {PAWN_objective}. Do know that this not guarantee that anyone will come...
LanguageData.CourierTenancyNoticeFail: {PAWN_nameDef} noticed your note for tenancy but it seems your previous one is still in circulation. {PAWN_pronoun} decides to leave it for now
LanguageData.AdvertisementPlaced: Advertisement is put up, let's wait for a courier to pick it up.
LanguageData.AdvertisementFailed: {PAWN_nameDef} somehow failed {PAWN_possessive} task of placing an advertisement. Could not find enough silver.
LanguageData.TenancyDeniedMessage: {PAWN_nameDef} have heard of your negligence towards tenants thus decided against living in your colony.
LanguageData.ContractText: {PAWN_nameDef} would love to prolong {PAWN_possessive} stay. Would you accept the same contract of {0} silver per day for {1} days?
LanguageData.ContractJoin: {PAWN_nameDef} seems to love {PAWN_possessive} stay and wishes to become a full fledged member of your colony. Do you accept? \n\nReject now and {PAWN_pronoun} wont ask again!
LanguageData.ContractJoinReject: {PAWN_nameDef} is saddened but does not pry further on your reasoning.
LanguageData.ContractJoinAccept: {PAWN_nameDef} is very happy and vows {PAWN_possessive} will not make you regret your decision.
LanguageData.MoodBelowThresholdDesc: Your tenant {PAWN_nameDef} is unhappy. Try to make {PAWN_objective} feel better or {PAWN_pronoun}'ll leave.
LanguageData.TenancyRoomRequiredDesc: A tenant pays for a single room but does not have one! You might earn their ire should this not be fixed soon.
LanguageData.CourierDaysSpawnDesc: The min time between courier events are random between these two values. Note that you do still require a noticeboard.
LanguageData.MoodTicksDesc: Amount of ticks until a tenant mood event may start.
LanguageData.AdvertisementCostDesc: The cost of putting up an advert for tenancy to be brought by Couriers.
LanguageData.TenancyRentContract: Base rent of {0} silver per day
LanguageData.KillPenaltyDesc: Whether killing tenants and couriers have other consequenses
LanguageData.GoldPaymentDesc: Couriers deliver mix of silver and gold (0-20%) when delivering rent. 1 gold = 10 silver
LanguageData.TenantsStoredDesc: Amount of tenants stored in the background for use in tenancy related quests. Higher number affects performance. Note: Currently contracted tenants are not accounted for and dead ones pruned.
